about_the_game:
Lead Your Troops into Battle


Engage in a battle of wits and strategy in this turn-based tactical RPG. Employ the distinctive abilities of each unit and leverage the battlefield's terrain to outsmart your adversaries and assert your dominance!

Exploit the Battlefield Terrain


Manipulate the environment to your advantage – push, pull, teleport, and displace your foes onto traps, inflicting additional damage and status effects between turns. Escape traps before the next round begins to defy fate and evade harm.

Solo Adventures, Cooperative Play, or Versus Challenges


Embark on a solitary journey through the Campaign and Solo Skirmishes, join forces with a friend in Cooperative play to combat menacing monsters, or engage in competitive scenarios and arenas in Versus mode!

Draft Your Elite Army


Select from 14 distinct unit roles to forge your own army with unique combinations. Each unit class boasts individual skills, playstyles, and synergies. Experiment with diverse combinations to uncover potent combos and force multipliers, enhancing your chances of triumph.

Strategic Mastery with Unit Skills


Unleash the power of each player-controlled unit's unique abilities, shaping their playstyle. Launch formidable attacks, rescue allies, intimidate enemies, and set the battlefield ablaze with awe-inspiring powers. Free actions can be seamlessly combined with other abilities for added potency and trickery.

Achieve Your Goals


Navigate diverse maps with distinct primary objectives and multiple win conditions. Adapt your strategy on the fly – if defeat seems imminent, shift tactics and aim for an alternative victory to turn the tide of battle!

Strategize Your Moves


Order your units' movements strategically, sequencing actions until all have been exhausted for the round. Time your attacks between your opponent's turns to strike precisely when the moment is just right!
